mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY D.ORDER_NO ORDER BY D.ORDER_NO, D.DELIVERY_DATE) ROW_NUM, DELIVERY_NO, O.ORDER_NO, TO_CHAR(DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')DELIVERY_DATE, ORDER_NAME, ORDER_TEL, ORDER_ADDRESS, O.PACKAGE_NO, P.PACKAGE_NAME, ORDER_PRICE, DELIVERY_STATUS, D.DELIVERY_CODE, ORDER_DEL_FL FROM DELIVERY D JOIN "ORDER" O ON (O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO) JOIN "DELIVERY_MANAGE" DM ON (DM.DELIVERY_CODE=D.DELIVERY_CODE) JOIN "PACKAGE" P ON (P.PACKAGE_NO=O.PACKAGE_NO) ORDER BY DELIVERY_DATE DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY D.ORDER_NO ORDER BY D.ORDER_NO, D.DELIVERY_DATE) ROW_NUM, DELIVERY_NO, O.ORDER_NO, TO_CHAR(DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')DELIVERY_DATE, ORDER_NAME, ORDER_TEL, ORDER_ADDRESS, O.PACKAGE_NO, P.PACKAGE_NAME, ORDER_PRICE, DELIVERY_STATUS, D.DELIVERY_CODE, ORDER_DEL_FL FROM DELIVERY D JOIN "ORDER" O ON (O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO) JOIN "DELIVERY_MANAGE" DM ON (DM.DELIVERY_CODE=D.DELIVERY_CODE) JOIN "PACKAGE" P ON (P.PACKAGE_NO=O.PACKAGE_NO) WHERE DELIVERY_NO = #{deliveryNo}
